Name: Plastic Tablet Press
Description: Your fingers get a mechanical assist.

Name: Gelatin Coating

Name: Child-Proof Caps

Description: Twice the dose in one click.

Name: Automated Sorting
Description: Robotic arms replace your tired hands.

Name: Micro-Dosing
Description: Sell less product for more money.

Name: Smart Pills
Description: They track when they've been taken.

Name: Quantum Encapsulation
Description: The pill exists in all stomachs simultaneously.

Name: Thought-Activated Dispenser
Description: Thinking about the drug administers it.

Name: DNA-Binders
Description: The drug becomes part of their genetic code.

Name: Reality Distortion Tablets
Description: Clicking changes the fabric of space-time.

Name: The God Pill
Description: One click to rule them all.

Name: Free Samples
Description: The first one is always free.

Name: Company Cars
Description: They can drive to victims faster.

Name: Hydroponic Labs
Description: Grown in pure chemical nutrient slime.

Name: Monoculture Patents
Description: We own the DNA of nature.

Name: Rebate Traps
Description: The money moves in a circle.

Name: Spread Pricing
Description: Buy low charge high keep the middle.

Name: Vertical Integration
Description: Own the insurer and the pharmacy.

Name: Ghostwriters
Description: Doctors don't have time to write.

Name: Peer Review Ring
Description: I approve yours you approve mine.

Name: Impact Factor Gaming
Description: We are the most cited because we cite ourselves.

Name: Consulting Gigs
Description: Nice job waiting for you after you quit.

Name: Regulatory Capture

Name: Molecule Tweaking
Description: Change one atom renew the patent.

Description: Ideas are property we own them.

Name: Receptor Tuning
Description: Fits the brain like a key.

Name: Selfie Filters
Description: Look sick so you buy medicine.

Name: Legislative Authors

Name: Algorithmic Collusion
Description: The bots agree to raise prices.

Name: Hospital Acquisition
Description: Buy the bed they die in.

Name: Tax Havens
Description: Cayman Islands are nice this time of year.

Name: Lobbying Victory

Name: Reality Adjustment

Name: Existence Tax
Description: Being exists because we say so.
